inclusion.criterion: Surgical indication of appendectomy under laparoscopy for simple acute appendicitis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ambulatory eligibility according to the criteria usually defined
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Parents and children able to understand the study and having signed informed consent
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Possibility of organizing childcare immediately at home
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects affiliated to Social Security system
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a known case of Acromegaly who underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He takes only vitamin D and multivitamins after his surgery.
